title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid causing the out of sync message.
SR:
1. Open the directory (project).
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar in the same directory (project).
4. Overwrite the exported jar file with a new version.
5. Notice the out of sync message.
